content:
Just by way of FYI ... I'm getting this when I try to access the domain (don't know if it's a local thing or a general SSL issue but said I'd send it on!)
image.png
@Daniel Rosehill weird! Can you send along any additional information? It works on my machine!:trademark:
Oh, I just saw this: "Hi Folx, for about 10 minutes, people from outside the Harvard net will see this message: Your connection is not private..."

Philip Durbin said:

Oh, I just saw this: "Hi Folx, for about 10 minutes, people from outside the Harvard net will see this message: Your connection is not private..."

Ah. Glad it was just a planned outage. After some time spent tinkering with certs this week, all I can say is that SSL is mighty temperamental.
